trans-unit.source: Use online backups to back up a database while it is running, without blocking transactions.

seg-source.mrk: Use online backups to back up a database while it is running, without blocking transactions.

target.mrk: Use online backups to back up a database while it is running, without blocking transactions.

trans-unit.source: You can perform online backups by using several types of backup procedures or by using operating system commands with the freeze and unfreeze system procedures.

seg-source.mrk: You can perform online backups by using several types of backup procedures or by using operating system commands with the freeze and unfreeze system procedures.

target.mrk: You can perform online backups by using several types of backup procedures or by using operating system commands with the freeze and unfreeze system procedures.
